msg.joinedEvnet: Successfully joined the event, please wait for the reward~
msg.minWithdraw: Operation failed, withdrawal less than minimum limit
msg.disableWithdraw: Platform withdrawal is suspended, waiting for reopening
msg.withdrawFail: Withdrawal failed, please contact customer service
msg.connectFail: Connection failed, please check if it is a dapp browser
msg.networkError: Network error, please refresh the page
msg.noBalance: Insufficient wallet balance, do you want to recharge?

reward.orderNo: Order No: Used to differentiate user-generated income
reward.userID: User ID: Used to differentiate user-generated income
reward.balance: Account Balance: User's current wallet balance
reward.dailyRate: Daily Rate: The calculated interest rate of user's daily income
reward.interest: Interest, the interest generated from this mining
reward.startTime: Start Time: The start time of interest generation for this order
reward.endTime: End Time: The end time of interest generation for this order
reward.status: Order Status, indicating whether the interest has been claimed for this order
reward.daystext: Acceleration Period, during which the interest rate will increase

text.auditReportSub: We have a secure audit report
text.disableWithdraw: Platform withdrawal is suspended, waiting for reopening
text.withdrawFeeTip: Fee for withdrawal amount exceeding the fee-free limit
text.withdrawFreeTip: Within this limit, withdrawals are fee-free
